docplyr
=======

`docplyr` is an R client for Simplified document database manipulation and analysis.

## Installation

```{r eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("sckott/docplyr")
```

```{r}
library("docplyr")
```

## Setup connection to database

Elasticsearch

```{r}
src_elastic()
```

CouchDB

```{r}
src_couchdb()
```
